original_text: Now his daughter-in-law, the wife of Phinehas, was pregnant, about to give birth. And when she heard the news that the ark of God was captured, and that her father-in-law and her husband were dead, she bowed and gave birth, for her pains came upon her.
korean_text: 그의 며느리인 비느하스의 아내가 임신하여 해산 때가 가까웠더니 하나님의 궤를 빼앗긴 것과 그의 시아버지와 남편이 죽은 소식을 듣고 갑자기 아파서 몸을 구푸려 해산하고

sentences.original_text: Now his daughter-in-law, the wife of Phinehas, was pregnant
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 며느리, 비느하스의 아내는 임신 중이었다

sentences.original_text: And when she heard the news
that the ark of God was captured
and that her father-in-law and her husband were dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 시아버지와 남편이 죽었다는 소식을

sentences.original_text: for her pains came upon her
